title: Exploring the Premodern World
description: MMW 121R is a distance education course. This course is the first of two required courses for ERC transfer students, addresses themes and topics from the premodern world (from antiquity to the eighteenth century), and strengthens students’ analytical, research, and writing skills. Students may not receive credit for both MMW 121 and 121R. Open to Eleanor Roosevelt College (ERC) transfer students only. Must be taken for a letter grade to meet the ERC graduation requirement.
